speaker: President. −
english: President. − We thank you, High Representative, for your speech and we wish you well for all your dangerous journeys. I think the safest place for you to be is the European Parliament. It must always be a pleasure for you to be here!
original: President. − We thank you, High Representative, for your speech and we wish you well for all your dangerous journeys. I think the safest place for you to be is the European Parliament. It must always be a pleasure for you to be here!
agenda_item: 2006 Annual report on the CFSP - Annual report on the implementation of the European Security Strategy and ESDP (debate)
